resources.string: STEP 2: Select any chat you want to analyze
STEP 3: Tap to 3-dot menu icon in top-right corner of your desired chat
STEP 4: Select “More” in the dropdown menu of options
STEP 5: Tap to "Export Chat" to generate the export
OK got it. Let\'s go to WhatsApp

WhatsCloud is a WhatsApp group analyzer and visualyzer tool that will tell you things like: 
• Who is the most chitty chatty person in your group
• What are the most common words
• Which days are the most active during the chat period
• And more…

Grab the logs by using adb logcat, then attach that log file into your report with the following informations: Device Model, Android Version, Rom type(Stock or Custom) and send it directly to the WhatsCloud\'s project page which hosted on git

Upgrade to premium and get the following features: 
• No Ads
• Custom setting number of words in wordclouds
• Custom stop word/filtering word adding support
WhatsApp is not installed on this phone
Let me recommend you this application
You need to upgrade to pro
Are you sure you want to exit?
